import { get, post } from '../util/axios'; // 子站筛选课程数据

export const getIndexData = params => post('/Api/v1/goldenfinance/schedule', params);
export const getMovie = params => post('/Api/v1/goldenfinance/schedule', params); // 获取热门课程

export const getHotCourse = params => post('/Home/getHotCourse', params); // 获取广告

export const getAd = params => get('/Home/getAd', params, false); // 获取广告详情（计数）

export const getAdInfo = params => get('/Home/getAdInfo', params, false); // 获取热门搜索

export const getHotSearch = () => get('/Home/getHotSearch', {}, false); // 获取系列

export const getCourseSeries = () => get('/Home/getCourseSeries', {}, false); // 获取开课城市

export const getCourseCity = () => get('/Home/getCourseCity', {}, false); // 签到

export const signUp = params => get('/common/signUp', params, true); //地址三级联动

export const getAllCity = () => get('/Home/getRegionList', {}, true); //热门搜索计数(专业)

export const getSeriesTime = params => get('/Home/setCourseSeriesHits', params, false);
